description:
At Goldstein & Hayes, P.C., in Atlanta, Georgia, the dedicated attorneys in our law firm practice only personal injury law, including wrongful death. We pride ourselves on our personal and professional commitment to making our clients' lives better and helping the injured when they need it most.

With over 60 years of combined legal experience, our attorneys stand ready, willing and able to represent our clients in the following types of cases:

• Motor vehicle accidents, including car, truck, bus and motorcycle accidents
• Construction accidents
• Drowning and pool accidents
• Medical malpractice
• Premises liability
• Product liability

In addition, our law firm compassionately represents grieving families who have lost a loved one to wrongful death due to someone's negligence.

Results That Speak For Themselves

The attorneys in our law firm have recovered over $250 million in compensation for our clients, including the following verdicts and settlements:

• $9 million - medical negligence resulting in brain injury
• $6 million - medical negligence resulting in brain injury
• $5.25 million - medical negligence resulting in wrongful death
• $4.5 million - swimming pool accident resulting in wrongful death
• $3.75 million - construction defect resulting in brain injury
• $2.4 million - auto accident resulting in multiple injuries

Goldstein & Hayes, P.C., offers free initial consultations, and our clients never pay a legal fee unless and until we win their cases. You can also rest assured that we will never treat you as just a case or a number. Instead, we will always give you the courtesy, respect and empathy you deserve.
